home.heroDescription: Discover the best car rental experience. New, safe, and stylish vehicles for every occasion. Book online quickly and easily.

section1.desc1: Choose your ideal car and book it in minutes, hassle-free.
section1.desc2: No surprises: know the final price from the start, with no hidden fees.
section1.desc3: Our team supports you before, during, and after your rental so you only have to enjoy.

reformSection.title: Why choose us?
reformSection.description: At J.R Rent we offer a modern fleet, professional service, and maximum flexibility. Book online, pay securely, and drive worry-free. Travel at your own pace with the best rental experience!

cards.title: New and inspected cars
cards.desc: Our fleet is constantly renewed and all vehicles pass quality checks.

cards.title: 100% online booking
cards.desc: Manage your reservation and payment from any device, securely.

cards.title: Full insurance included
cards.desc: Drive with peace of mind: all our cars include comprehensive insurance.

cards.title: Flexible cancellation
cards.desc: Change or cancel your booking for free up to 24h before.

cards.title: 24/7 support
cards.desc: We are available to help you anytime, every day.

cards.title: Easy pick-up and drop-off
cards.desc: Choose where to pick up and return your car, no waiting.

items.description: Premium automatic sedan, ideal for business or leisure trips. Equipped with GPS, climate control, and all safety systems.
Compact SUV, perfect for families or getaways. Efficient engine, large trunk, and advanced connectivity.

contact.title: Contact
